attributes.action: free the violet one from the bbc radio leeds kitchen to continue with too many cooks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is for violet to continue the fantastic gameshow on bbc radio leeds 92.4-95.3fm too many cooks on the graham liver show    manchester you can't have her

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
